title: Microaggression Awareness and Response Competency Workshop in Clinical Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Terminology and Fundamental Understanding of Clinical Settings
context.additional_context: Interactive case-based education for individuals preparing to enter medical environments

learning_goals: Learners can identify and classify three or more examples of microaggressions occurring in clinical settings.
Learners can concretely explain five or more response strategies applicable when microaggressions occur.
Learners can perform appropriate response methods for real-life situations with over 80% accuracy through role-playing.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
